create.title: Create Your Goal

form.title: Goal Title
form.description_placeholder: Add more details about your goal... This will help us create a personalized plan for you.
form.target_days_daily_helper: Daily goals automatically use all 7 days
form.days_of_week_helper: Select which days of the week you want to work on this goal
form.reminder_times_description: Set times when you want to be reminded.
form.reminder_times_description_fitness: Set your preferred workout times. We'll remind you when it's time to exercise.
form.reminder_times_description_nutrition: Set times for your nutrition check-ins. We'll remind you to log your meals.
form.reminder_times_description_wellness: Set times for your wellness routine. We'll remind you to take care of yourself.
form.reminder_times_description_mindfulness: Set times for your mindfulness practice. We'll remind you to pause and reflect.
form.reminder_times_description_sleep: Set your target bedtime and wake-up reminders for better sleep habits.
form.reminder_times_description_custom: Set times when you want to be reminded about this goal.

track_progress.title: Track Your Progress

welcome.title: Let's personalize your journey

fitness_level.title: What's your current fitness level?
fitness_level.subtitle: This helps us recommend the right goals for you

beginner.title: Beginner
beginner.description: Just starting out or getting back into fitness

intermediate.title: Intermediate
intermediate.description: Regularly active, comfortable with basic exercises

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Very active, looking for challenging workouts

primary_goal.title: What's your primary fitness goal?
primary_goal.subtitle: Choose the goal that matters most to you right now

sport_specific.title: Sport-Specific
sport_specific.description: Train for a specific sport or activity

current_habits.title: How often do you currently exercise?
current_habits.subtitle: Be honest - this helps us set realistic expectations

workout_setting.title: Where do you prefer to work out?
workout_setting.subtitle: This helps us suggest the right types of goals

gym.title: Gym
gym.description: I prefer working out at a gym or fitness center

home.title: Home
home.description: I prefer working out at home

outdoor.title: Outdoor
outdoor.description: I prefer outdoor activities and exercises

mix.title: Mix
mix.description: I like to mix it up with different locations

dont_know.title: Don't know yet
dont_know.description: I'm still figuring out what works for me

available_time.title: How much time can you commit to workouts?
available_time.subtitle: This helps us suggest realistic goals

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.description: Time varies depending on the day

biggest_challenge.title: What's your biggest fitness challenge?
biggest_challenge.subtitle: This helps us understand what you need the most support with

time_management.title: Time Management
time_management.description: Struggling to find time to exercise regularly

lack_of_motivation.title: Lack of Motivation
lack_of_motivation.description: Finding it hard to stay motivated and consistent

not_knowing_what_to_do.title: Not Knowing What to Do
not_knowing_what_to_do.description: Uncertain about what exercises or routines to follow

consistency.title: Consistency
consistency.description: Difficulty maintaining a regular workout routine

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: Need someone to keep me on track

injury_concerns.title: Injury Concerns
injury_concerns.description: Worried about getting hurt or re-injuring myself

motivation_style.title: What motivates you most?
motivation_style.subtitle: This helps us tailor your AI coach's personality

tough_love.title: Tough Love
tough_love.description: I need someone to push me hard and hold me accountable

gentle_encouragement.title: Gentle Encouragement
gentle_encouragement.description: I respond best to supportive, positive reinforcement

data_driven.title: Data-Driven
data_driven.description: I'm motivated by numbers, stats, and measurable progress

accountability_buddy.title: Accountability Buddy
accountability_buddy.description: I need someone to check in with and share my journey
